snippet: The Los Angeles City Council gave initial approval Tuesday to an ordinance banning stores from providing customers single-use plastic bags.
abstract: Los Angeles City Council gives initial approval to ordinance banning stores from providing customers single-use plastic bags.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles City Council gave initial approval Tuesday to an ordinance banning stores from providing customers single-use plastic bags.

headline.main: California: Plastic Bags on Way Out
headline.print_headline: California: Plastic Bags On Way Out
